for some reason Music NFO Builder didn't pick up track 9 in the .m3u Disc 1

so if you use the .m3u to play your flac

then please Edit the .m3u to include track 9.

To Edit open the .m3u with notepad and replace with everything below.



#EXTM3U
#EXTINF:325,Robin Trower - I Can't Wait Much Longer [2010 Digital Remaster]
01 - I Can't Wait Much Longer [2010 Digital Remaster].flac
#EXTINF:387,Robin Trower - Daydream [2010 Digital Remaster]
